alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 1:11AM MDT until July 22 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Purgatoire River Near Las Animas affecting Bent County. For the Purgatoire River...including Las Animas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Purgatoire River Near Las Animas. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Moderate agricultural flooding occurs in low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.5 feet on 08/19/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 115 PM MDT.
